pages.text: $(li)The Snowy Tundra is a cold biome composed of mostly by Dirt covered with a layer of Snow and Water lakes turned into Ice lakes.$(br)$(li)It can be found in the Overworld.$(br)$(li)Not too many vegetation can survive in these hard conditions, just the Spruce trees and Poppies.
$(li)Mooses can be found walking around this biome too.$(br)$(li)You can search this biome introducing the words $(l)Snowy Tundra$() in the search box of the Nature's Compass.
